text: xallxhˌ di thrng sayya kæ brrda mu min chay læa brrda mu mi n hying sung brrda swn swrrkh sung mi mæna hlay say hil xyu phay tı swn swrrkh hela nan doythi phwk khea ca xyu nı nan tlxd kal læa brrda sthan thi phanak xan di sung xyu nı brrda swn swrrkh hæng khwam watʹhna sthaphr læa khwam piti yindi ca kxallxhˌ nan hıy kwa nan khux chaychna xan hıy hlwng
